a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Daily per capita incomes: Mean vs. Median, 2019
Incomes or expenditures are derived from household surveys. Some countries conduct surveys that ask for the
household's income, while others ask for the household's expenditure.
Both measures are adjusted for price changes over time (inflation) and for price differences between countries.
